name: Romantic Gent
description: Hat mainly worn by elders. It reminds people of the happy time in their adolescence.

name: Romantic Gent Blueprint
description: Hat mainly worn by elders. It reminds people of the happy time in their adolescence.

name: Romantic Gent [1]
description: Hat mainly worn by elders. It reminds people of the happy time in their adolescence.

name: Romantic Leaf
description: Romantic Leaf. When keep them in the mouths, you can feel the sense of wind and roaming.

name: Romantic Leaf Blueprint
description: Romantic Leaf. When keep them in the mouths, you can feel the sense of wind and roaming.

name: Ronald's Coin
description: A coin engraved with the challenger's name. It symbolizes honor and strength for dueling clubs.

name: Rookie Cook Chest I
description: In addition to satisfying the appetite, the primary gourmet has a certain pursuit for flavor. Try these common foods. (Open the pack to find 1-star food)

name: Rookie Dish Pack A
description: A sealed dish pack. You cannot tell what is inside it from its appearance. Please be careful not to shake it!

name: Rookie Food Pack I
description: Apprentices often waste food because they lack skills, so some primary ingredients are provided by Royal Cuisine Association for practice. (Open the pack to find some primary ingredients)

name: Rookie Picnic Pad
description: The favorite picnic pad of adventurers who just start to learn cooking. Unfold it anywhere to picnic.

name: Rooster Bandana Blueprint
description: Headdress made of special materials and techniques only available in the year of Rooster. It's really priceless.

name: Rooster Year Bandana
description: Rooster Year Bandana

name: Rooster Year Bandana
description: Headdress made of special materials and techniques only available in the year of Rooster. It's really priceless.

name: Rooster Year Red Pack
description: Legend has it that in the Eastern country, one of the customs for celebrating the new year is, children find small red envelopes specially given by the gods under their pillows. The custom is now also prevalent in Midgard. (Use it to receive a small amount of Zeny granted by Unitary God) (1-500Zeny, adventures cannot see this tip.)

name: Root of Stone
description: At the beginning of ancient times, the root of stone lay along the roadside. Try to dig it up.

name: Rosa Bracelet
description: Simple bracelet, engraved with "P.L.K" on the inside.

name: Rosa Bracelet [1]
description: Simple bracelet, engraved with "P.L.K" on the inside.

name: Rosa Shield
description: A shield made of exotic metal, surrounded by many pieces of metal, looking like a rose in full bloom.

name: Rosa Shield [1]
description: A shield made of exotic metal, surrounded by many pieces of metal, looking like a rose in full bloom.

name: Rosary
description: Blessed by God, it is a cross-shaped necklace.
